Title: Extends the limitations on the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland
Summary: Extends the limitations on the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland for the 2023--2024 assessment rolls.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to extending limitations on the shift between classes of taxable property in the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland
